metadata.description:
Emily Lazar is a multi-disciplinary artist fronting the rock/metal transmedia project, September Mourning, who made history as the first female metal/ hard rock musician to mint and sell an NFT. She has over 750 collectors over various platforms and  she has spoken about her accomplishments in NFTs at Harvard, NFT.NYC and ETH Denver. 

September Mourning is a transmedia project based on a comic book series she wrote and published through Image/Top Cow Comics with her business partner Marc Silvestri (Batman/Witchblade/Darkness). September Mourning is the title character. As a human reaper hybrid, she  gives expired souls a second chance at life in another body. In doing so, she messes with  the plans of the antagonist, Fate, who is trying to rid  earth of all the good souls and leave the bad so the world will self-destruct and It can start anew. An epic war between the living and the dead ensues. Emily plays the title character on stage.

Emily designed the world she and her band (Rich Juzwick, Kyle Mayer and Aaron Hoover) bring to life on stage, including costumes, choreography, sets, etc. The band has toured with & opened festivals for Rob Zombie, Marilyn Manson, Slipknot, Mudvayne and others across Europe and the United States.

"Glass Animals" is about the disillusionment of connection and the realization of loss. The title character, September, feels this consistently throughout the books. Moreover this feeling is a universal one that the listener will surely find relatable. The music has a haunting tonality to it which reinforces the nature of the lyrics. The drawn out melodic guitars mimic the vocal melodies and add to the melancholy feel of the song. The entire composition tips its hat to the Deftones, one of Emily's favorite bands. 

The artwork contains the characters created by Emily and depicted by Image/ Top Cow Comic Book Artist Summeye Kesgin.

lyrics.text:
GLASS ANIMALS

God is dead
And heaven is all locked up
Hope is lost to you and i 

Deep inside
Digging through our landslide
Searching for the halo you tossed aside

You and I 
we’re glass animals 
Glass animals
Shattered to survive
Now i know
I would break myself wide open for you
My sacrifice reflected in your eyes


Hell is here
Tearing our insides out 
Catching all the angels as they fall

You and I 
we’re glass animals 
Glass animals
Shattered to survive
Now i know
I could break myself wide open just for you
My sacrifice reflected in your eyes


I Don’t trust what I see 
Even salt looks like sugar
every word binds like gravity
a crack in the earth will release me
All I want is you and all I see is….
You and I 
All I need is 
You and I 
All I see is

You and I 
we’re glass animals 
Glass animals
Shattered to survive
Now i know
I could break myself wide open just for you
My sacrifice reflected in your eyes

metadata.name: Glass Animals #1
